frontmatter.title: Coredns
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for Coredns
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Serves zone data from a file; both DNSSEC (NSEC only) and DNS are supported (file and auto).
Retrieves zone data from primaries, i.e., act as a secondary server (AXFR only) (secondary).
